name: Aquariworm
description:
This is a brand-new game for the Mattel Aquarius. It is available as a physical tape purchase from Cronosoft , or as a free digital download. In order to play Aquariworm as a digital download, you will need the Micro Expander fitted to your Aquarius. The physical tape version will load on to any Aquarius with a 4K ram pack (no need for the Micro expander for the tape version). 

Guide your worm around the screen collecting the food and avoiding the barriers, traps and walls that have been placed in your path. The world that the worm lives in is a dangerous place, and it will take time and skill for you to navigate through this dangerous assortment of enemies. This full colour, fast paced game will keep you coming back for more, as you try to grow your worm and avoid the obstacles.
